description: Application pursuant to Section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act for non-material amendments to planning permission 19/6512/OUT dated 06/05/2021 for the Hybrid planning approval (part in outline, part detailed) for the phased comprehensive redevelopment of Phase 3 of the former Peel Centre site including demolition of existing structures and the construction of a residential led mixed use development comprising up to 1,200 new residential units (Use Class C3) in buildings of up to 26 storeys in height; up to 351 sqm flexible retail floorspace (Use Classes A1-A4); site preparation and enabling works; highways/access works; landscaping; car and cycle parking; and other associated works.The application proposes amendments to the plans approved under Condition 1 and the Supporting Document: CD17 Fire Statement to include the proposal of a second escape stairwell to core X2 and the linking of escape stairs by means of common linking corridor in cores X1 and X4, as well as subsequent internal layouts changes to communal and internal apartment areas and minor occupancy changes.
site_name: Development Site Formerly Part Of Peel Centre
